page.title: 10RECREATION
page.content: and Carols for parents and friends. The Village Hall is next door to the school and every Monday afternoon mothers bring pre-school children to a play-group which is held in the Hall. Every Tuesday evening between seven p.m. and nine p.m. sports facilities are provided for local children by Action Van - a van specially adapted to take sports equipment to village communities in the South Hams. On Wednesday evenings a Keep Fit class is held between eight and nine o'clock. Once a month the Parish Council use the Hall for a meeting place. The Village Hall is also used for wedding receptions, barn dances, discos and other functions.
